channel.title: A new coder
channel.description: Okay well here's my question it's for vendors, npcs, and commands... I don't know crap worth Java coding, C, LUA, and C++ is a different story. None the less all I ask is someone to please help me with making npcs, vendors, and commands. And trust me I've looked all over your forums and others, along with google and youtube. No realistic luck. If anyone can just give me some instructions on how to do it I'd be forever greatful. Mainly what I'm trying to look for is Vendors for all different types of gear, like party hats? and stuff along those lines. Npc's not really needed, but would love something to help level a character faster. I'm sure modding a melee dummy would help. For commands....I have no clue how it works for java, only C and LUA...Sad isn't it? Anyways, I'm trying to give players commands, like.... ::additemset 1 and suddenly they get a full rune body or something. Want to know if that's possible at all... And also I'd love to see anyone post ALL the commands you get on RS, because I know there has to be something to delete vendors, and npcs. All the commands I know: teleport teleto ban banip npc pickup

item.title: A new coder
item.dc:creator: @sk1llmunky sk1llmunky
item.description:
@sk1llmunky wrote:

uhm in the run.bat file did u change it to your jdk version cuz 508+ uses jdk to host

Read full topic

item.title: A new coder
item.dc:creator: @xxpkswings xxpkswings
item.description:
@xxpkswings wrote:

do you think I haven’t tried?
When I say everything…I mean it.
I scrolled out 15 pages for google alone just to find ONE repack for 614 that didn’t end up being from these forums and gone.
AND IF I found one it was either not working or someone elses.
Most likey this place’s again. 90% of the time.
I wish I could say it without sounding prissy but, fuck I’ve tried and damn hard!

Read full topic

item.title: A new coder
item.dc:creator: @sk1llmunky sk1llmunky
item.description:
@sk1llmunky wrote:

[quote=“xxpkswings, post:8, topic:382055”]I don’t want to play on someone else’s get it?
Last 614 server I was on was probably hosted by some fucking aryan!
I’m all fine for cussing but last thing I care to see when I get home from work is… “you search the crate and found a dildo”
Like a fucking ten year old created it! What the hell…
It’s runescape not your place to make a command to kneel that suddenly says “all hail hitler” just wtf!
So I want to make my OWN NOTE THE WORD OWN. server.
Is it so wrong to ask for help?[/quote]
he is talking about looking in the server downloads and finding a 614 server, downloading it and start coding

Read full topic

item.title: A new coder
item.dc:creator: @xxpkswings xxpkswings
item.description:
@xxpkswings wrote:

By the way if anyone knows where I could find a 614 hd repack I’d love ya for life…
I looked all over for one… All I get is people’s servers.
Rather have my own with my friends ya know?

Read full topic

item.title: A new coder
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=Cole1497 link=topic=477856.msg3496839#msg3496839 date=1297384336]

no idea what you’re talking about… I’m talking about runescape…

So is he. Runewings is talking about the source type (project insanity or delta). Check your files, and if you have class8, class3, etc. it’s delta. If it says itemdef, or anything like that, it’s Project Insanity (pi)
[/quote]WRONG.

Class # is non-renamed (or non-refactored, whatever you wish to say), while ItemDef, EntityDef, etc. is refactored/renamed.

Delta uses both refactored and non-refactored clients, while Project Insanity does too.[/quote]
oh

Read full topic

item.title: A new coder
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

xxpkswings:

no idea what you’re talking about… I’m talking about runescape…

So is he. Runewings is talking about the source type (project insanity or delta). Check your files, and if you have class8, class3, etc. it’s delta. If it says itemdef, or anything like that, it’s Project Insanity (pi)

Read full topic

item.title: A new coder
item.dc:creator: @xxpkswings xxpkswings
item.description:
@xxpkswings wrote:

Okay well here’s my question it’s for vendors, npcs, and commands…
I don’t know crap worth Java coding, C, LUA, and C++ is a different story.
None the less all I ask is someone to please help me with making npcs, vendors, and commands.
And trust me I’ve looked all over your forums and others, along with google and youtube. No realistic luck.
If anyone can just give me some instructions on how to do it I’d be forever greatful.
Mainly what I’m trying to look for is Vendors for all different types of gear, like party hats? and stuff along those lines.
Npc’s not really needed, but would love something to help level a character faster. I’m sure modding a melee dummy would help.
For commands…I have no clue how it works for java, only C and LUA…Sad isn’t it?
Anyways, I’m trying to give players commands, like… ::additemset 1 and suddenly they get a full rune body or something.
Want to know if that’s possible at all…
And also I’d love to see anyone post ALL the commands you get on RS, because I know there has to be something to delete vendors, and npcs.
All the commands I know:
teleport
teleto
ban
banip
npc
pickup

Read full topic
